Name: Animal Avatar Maker for VRChat Vroid VRM and Cluster
About the game: Zoo Studio just helps you to make your own 3D animal avatars easily. The avatars generated would be used in VRM compatible softwares such as VMagicMirror. Remember to config blendshape clips in Unity by importing the VRM generated You would also upload it to VRchat by importing the VRM into Unity. Further tutorial is provided in the software. Some of the avatars are locked. You would unlock them by following the guides inside the software. Features supported: Shape tuning Clothes and accessories changing system Brush and sticker painting
